title: Shaking Creeper
author: Creeper娘控
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Creeper娘控 于 2014-10-3 17:42 编辑 

On a sunny moring .At a small village .在一个晴朗的早晨，一个小村庄里~





2014-10-03_11.33.57.png (377.64 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2014-10-3 16:58 上传




oh , sorry , isn't  it .哦，不，图放错了 = =






2014-10-03_16.42.15.png (237.07 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2014-10-3 16:58 上传




Yeah .好了

The Enderman . . . well , the Ender laddy builds a store . 末影人...好吧，末影小姐开了个商店





2014-10-03_16.45.09.png (132.92 KB, 下载次数: 1)

下载附件

2014-10-3 16:58 上传




This !就是这个！

She invents a new project named " Shaking Creeper " .她发明了一个新产品——震动苦力怕= =
How cute it is ! Almost every one likes it .震动苦力怕非常可爱，深受大家好评
It looks like a smaller creeper .看起来就像一个小号苦力怕~





2014-10-03_16.44.57.png (150.4 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2014-10-3 16:58 上传






Creeper comes .原版苦力怕来了
She sees the tiny creeper .她看见了小号苦力怕（苦力怕手办？）
 : What's that ?这是什么？

The Ender ( there were no pictures about her ) : The Shaking Creeper , my invention . 震动苦力怕
 : That's funny ! Can I have one ?真有趣，我可以要一个吗？（版权费？）

The Ender : Of course .当然
 : How to play it ?这怎么玩？

The Ender : Do you see its left foot ? In fact , it's a button . Try it please .你看见它的左脚了吗？那其实是一个按钮，你按一下
Creeper pushes the button , the tiny creeper begin to shake .苦力怕按了一下，小苦力怕开始震动
The Ender : It is funny , isn't it ? 很有趣，是吧？
 :      . . .
The Ender : And it is useful .并且很有用 （ = = 邪恶...）
 : It looks like a . . . Shit ! I will kill you !它看起来就像...什么破玩意？！我要杀了你！
Creeper runs after the Ender and throws the TNT to her .苦力怕边追着小黑边向她扔TNT
The Ender : I am sorry for that . It is hurt !我很抱歉...啊好疼


Well , the Shaking Creeper has disappeared since the Creeper saw that . 
But you can still get it from The Ender Department Store .
